docs.lead_paragraph: JANE BRODY'S NUTRITION BOOK By Jane Brody. Illustrated. 552 pp. New York: W. W. Norton & Co. $17.95 By JEAN MAYER JANE BRODY, the personal health columnist for The New York Times, is a fine journalist and a careful researcher. Her new book comes at just the right time, for as she says on its first page, ''We are a people ignorant of good nutrition.'' But it is also true that the desire and need for reliable information on foods and health has never been greater.
